titles.title: You're my glory, and the lifter of my head,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You're my glory, and the lifter of my head,
You're my glory, and the lifter of my head;
For thou, O Lord, are a shield to me,
My glory and the lifter of my head.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When the terror of the enemy
Seems to rise all around me,
Still I will not be afraid
For there is One greater,
My Shield, my Defender,
He will stand beside me till that day.
